text:
Environment: 
Linux Suse - Intel server: running jmeter -s
Linux Suse - Intel Laptop: running jmeter
NT 4 - Intel Laptop : running jmeter


First problem: Had to build 1.8 to make a remote connection to Linux remote
server.  1.8 as downloaded would not connect to the server.
Exception from the client:
 01/29/2003 2:40:13 PM ERROR - jmeter.engine:  java.rmi.MarshalException: error m
 arshalling arguments; nested exception is:
         java.net.SocketException: Broken pipe
         at sun.rmi.server.UnicastRef.invoke(UnicastRef.java:129)
         at org.apache.jmeter.engine.RemoteJMeterEngineImpl_Stub.configure(Unknow
 n Source)

After simply rebuilding, this went away.
creator: chrispesarchick@westfieldgrp.com

text: This bug isn't relevant to any version other than 1.8.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
